title: Chapter 1292 - The Impermeable Demon Ocean
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1292 - The Impermeable Demon Ocean

What about Qing Wan? How did she wind up by my side?

That, the jade slip didn’t explain.

But Su Yi dared say with certainty that it wasn’t a coincidence.

After all, when he reawakened the memories of his past life on the Azure Continent, he was in Guangling City, a backwater even by the standards of a remote mundane nation like the Great Zhou.

And Qing Wan, Lady Snowjade’s closed-door disciple, somehow appeared by his side just after he reawakened memories of his past life.

How could that possibly be a coincidence?

When Su Yi faced the possessed Heavenly Prayer in Crow Ridge, he asked Lady Snowjade about it, but alas. He got no answers.

“That so-called ‘Lady Snowjade’ surely has some secret art that lets her sense Shen Mu’s situation. I’m certain she could even sense that I’m his reincarnation. That’s the only explanation that makes sense,” thought Su Yi.

This was mere conjecture.

Su Yi knew that fusing with Shen Mu’s memories would bring him one step closer to the truth, but alas, his opportunity had yet to arrive. He still couldn’t fuse with the Dao Imprint Shen Mu had left behind.

“Perhaps I can learn the truth when I get my hands on that old schemer, the T...
